product_name: REI Airflyte T-Shirt - Men's - Special Buy
long_description: Featuring soft, lightweight fabric, the REI Airflyte men's T-shirt makes it easy to stay comfortable while you tackle your 10-mile run or work up a sweat playing frisbee in the park. Lightweight, breathable polyester fabric with a hint of stretch wicks away moisture to keep your skin dry and comfortable. Built-in UPF 50+ sun protection shields skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Special buy.
